casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Roger Allan FINCHER. No. 279P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 27, 2006. Brenda Eaddy, Assistant Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of July 2006 by Defendant to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of July 2006."
